#include "stdio.h"
#include "string.h"
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define ll long long unsigned int
char B[100];
int A[10]={18,4,10,10,8,10,18,9,21,18};
int main()
{
	ll t,ct;
	char *p;
	scanf("%llu",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",B);
		p=B;
		ct=0;
		while(*p!='\0')
		{
			ct+=A[*p-48];
			p++;
		}
		printf("%llu\n",ct);
	}
return 0;
}
